蒱字的基本解释

蒱
pú
〔樗（
ch?）蒱〕同“樗蒲”（a.古代玩类似掷色子之类的游戏；b.色子，如“稍见云中白若蒱蒱数十立者，山也。”）

蒱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pú］
［《廣韻》薄胡切，平模，並。］
樗蒱。古代的一种博戏。后世亦指赌博。

蒱字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒱； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1049第36
【唐韻】薄胡切【韻會】蓬晡切，?音匍。【類篇】樗蒱，戲也。【晉書·陶侃傳】樗蒱者，牧豬奴戲耳。　又【韻會】通蒲。【荀子·不苟篇】柔從若蒱葦。

蒱字的源字形

暂无。

Pang
Basic explanation of words
Pang
pú
〔樗（
ch?) Pang] Same as "樗PU" (a. played games like dice throwing in ancient times; b. dice, such as "for a moment, if there are dozens of white people standing in the clouds, the mountains are also.")
Pang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pú］
["Guang Yun" thin Hu cut, flat mold, and. ]
撱蒱. An ancient gambling game. Later generations also refer to gambling.
Pang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蒱; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1049 Page 36
【Tang Yun】Bo Huqie 【Yunhui】Peng Xiqie, sound creeping. 【Classes】Ailang, play also. [Book of Jin·Tao Kan Biography] A barnyard man, a pig-herder, a slave to play with ears.　[Rhyme Club] Tongpu. 【Xunzi·Meticulous Article】Ruo Lingwei is soft.
